name: Guardians of the Galaxy (rexxpaul)
description:
This is my Mini Project! The Game is called GUARDIAN OF THE GALAXY.

I've added the following awesome modified Features:

  1. New UI Design (New Main Menu, Pause Screen, Levels Select Screens, etc)
  2. New 5 Different Levels with BOSS in some levels
  3. NEW Instructions & Game Credits under INSTRUCTIONS OPTION 
  4. NEW Main Menu & Gameplay Music
  5. NEW Stronger Enemies
  6. NEW Level Ambience with some cool Celestial Objects

I HOPE YOU ENJOYED THE GAME :)

HAPPY PLAYING <3

Credits: Created by Subham Paul (21BCS8741)
